TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ObjectQuery : System.Collections.IEnumerable, System.ComponentModel.IListSource, System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable, System.Linq.IQueryable

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ObjectQuery extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable, class System.Linq.IQueryable
Public MustInherit Class ObjectQuery Implements IEnumerable, IListSource, IOrderedQueryable, IQueryable
public ref class ObjectQuery abstract : System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::ComponentModel::IListSource, System::Linq::IOrderedQueryable, System::Linq::IQueryable

summary.span: 使用 LINQ to Entities 和 之概念模型，實作這些查詢的通用功能。

span.span: Implements common functionality for queries against a conceptual model using both LINQ to Entities and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是針對概念模型進行查詢的基底類別。 is the base class for queries against a conceptual model. 提供可確保 LINQ to Entities 查詢具有相同的功能，以執行使用查詢。 is provided to ensure that LINQ to Entities queries have the same functionality as queries executed using . 您必須使用查詢概念模型的指定類型。You must use with a specified type to query a conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandText As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Returns the command text for the query.
A value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As ObjectContext
public: property System::Data::Objects::ObjectContext ^ Context { System::Data::Objects::ObjectContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與這個物件查詢相關聯的內容物件。

span.span: Gets the object context associated with this object query.

value.span: 與這個 執行個體 (Instance) 相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查詢的內容包含連接、快取和中繼資料 (Metadata)。The context for the query includes the connection, cache, and metadata. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件服務概觀 (Entity Framework)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/43014cf9-c9cb-4538-bfbb-197820b60038)。For more information, see [Object Services Overview (Entity Framework)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/43014cf9-c9cb-4538-bfbb-197820b60038). 連接屬性是可變動的，而且您必須先設定連接屬性，然後才能執行查詢。The connection property is mutable and must be set before a query can be executed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件服務 (Entity Framework) 中的 管理連線](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a1df87ef-6441-417d-b264-bb58360e5d67)。For more information, see [Managing Connections in Object Services (Entity Framework)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a1df87ef-6441-417d-b264-bb58360e5d67). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會取得與這個 物件相關聯的 物件。The example gets the object associated with this object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Context](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_context)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Context](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_context)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePlanCaching { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否應該快取查詢計畫。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query plan should be cached.

value.span: 值，這個值會指出是否應該快取查詢計畫。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the query plan should be cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢計劃快取](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/query-plan-caching-entity-sql.md)。For more information, see [Query Plan Caching](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/query-plan-caching-entity-sql.md).

The default is .

summary.span: 使用指定的合併選項執行不具型別的物件查詢。

span.span: Executes the untyped object query with the specified merge option.

returns.span: ，其中包含查詢所傳回之實體 (Entity) 物件的集合。

span.span: An that contains a collection of entity objects returned by the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件查詢的預設合併選項是 。The default merge option for object queries is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 在 上針對具型別的物件查詢呼叫 方法。Call the method on for typed object queries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage GetResultType() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回查詢之結果型別的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the result type of the query.

returns.span: 值，其中包含查詢之結果型別的相關資訊。

span.span: A value that contains information about the result type of the query.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會建立型別為 的 並且使用 來判斷傳回的型別是否代表資料列。The example creates an of type and uses to determine whether the type returned represents a row. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#GetResultType](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#getresulttype)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#GetResultType](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#getresulttype)]

summary.span: 取得或設定從查詢傳回的物件如何加入至內容物件。

span.span: Gets or sets how objects returned from a query are added to the object context.
The query .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定 ，預設值就是 。If no is specified, the default value is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As ObjectParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得這個物件查詢的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the parameter collection for this object query.
The parameter collection for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用傳回的 來指定傳遞給查詢的參數。Use the returned to specify parameters that are passed to the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合，並且取得這個 的參數集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection and then gets the parameter collection for this . 然後，它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。Then it iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed
Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 就會使用 屬性所指定的合併選項來執行查詢。Calling executes the query with the merge option that is specified by the property. C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `For Each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property ContainsListCollection As Boolean Implements IListSource.ContainsListCollection

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出查詢所傳回的集合是否包含集合物件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection returned by the query contains collection objects.
A Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`因為物件並不是集合，包含查詢所傳回的集合。This property always returns `false` because the collection returned by the query contains objects and not collections.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IList System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList() cil managed
Function GetList () As IList Implements IListSource.GetList

summary.span: 傳回集合當做用於資料繫結 (Data Binding) 的 。

span.span: Returns the collection as an used for data binding.
An of entity objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會啟用查詢結果的資料繫結。This method enables data binding to the result of the query. 繫結至集合的控制項會呼叫此方法。It is called by the control bound to the collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件與控制項繫結](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b)。For more information, see [Binding Objects to Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b).

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property ElementType As Type Implements IQueryable.ElementType

summary.span: 取得這個查詢執行個體的結果項目型別。

span.span: Gets the result element type for this query instance.

value.span: ，它是這個查詢執行個體的結果項目型別。

span.span: A that is the result element type for this query instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Expression As Expression Implements IQueryable.Expression

summary.span: 取得描述這個查詢的運算式。

span.span: Gets the expression describing this query.
The LINQ that describes this query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若為使用 LINQ 產生器模式所建置 (Build) 的查詢，這就會傳回完整的 LINQ 運算式樹狀架構。否則，它會傳回包裝這個查詢的常數運算式。For queries built by using LINQ builder patterns, this returns a full LINQ expression tree; otherwise, it returns a constant expression that wraps this query. 請注意，系統不會快取預設運算式。Note that the default expression is not cached. 這讓此架構能夠區別 LINQ 與 Entity SQL 查詢。This allows the framework to differentiate between LINQ and Entity SQL queries. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

value.span: 與這個查詢執行個體相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with this query instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
